gratuityoop

Class GratuityClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • gratuityoop.GratuityClass

  • public class GratuityClass
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a class that can be used to calculate tip, and amount based on percentage, bill amount and split by
    Version:
    1.0 3/11/2020
    Author:
    Gary Clifford

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GratuityClass(double bill, double gratuityPercentage, int splitBillBy)
      Constructor Does the calculations needed for desired output if splitBillBy is 0 this is interpreted that splitBillBy should be 1 and code makes that adjustment

    • Constructor Detail

      • GratuityClass

        public GratuityClass(double bill,
                     double gratuityPercentage,
                     int splitBillBy)
        Constructor Does the calculations needed for desired output if splitBillBy is 0 this is interpreted that splitBillBy should be 1 and code makes that adjustment
        Parameters:
        bill - full bill amount from the waitstaff
        gratuityPercentage - Percentage for tip (enter .15 for 15%)
        splitBillBy - for the total bill with tip how should bill be split
